prompts: Create a fluffy Pokemon with pastel colors and a sweet aroma that captures the essence of desserts.
Imagine a playful creature that loves to gather berries and has a soft, puffy appearance.
Design a Fairy-type Pokemon that resembles a tasty treat, with a charming personality and whimsical features.
Show me a Pokemon that is round and bubbly, with a signature pink color and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a cute creature that embodies sweetness, with a scarf and a round, fluffy body.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that can float and has a big, round head adorned with a cherry.
I want a Pokemon that looks delicious and is often found in urban areas delighting children.
